infobox.Japanese title:: ダイエットにご用心  (Daietto ni Goyōjin)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Juzo Megure  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Seiji Muta  Miharu Nagano (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Junko Asami as Yasuko Inomata  Akeno Watanabe as Kaoru Iimori  Chika Sakamoto as Atsuko Degawa  Yumi Hikita as Tsukiko Satoyama

sections.Situation: Ran, Sonoko, and Conan are at a yoga resort, when one of its customers, Atsuko Degawa, dies from poison found in her food. It's deduced to be a suicide.
sections.People:
- 34 years old
- Training studio owner and instructor
- Training studio idol dog
- 29 years old
- Chef
- Victim (poison)
- 26 years old
- Diet training participant
- 26 years old
- Atsuko's friend
